<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1beta/workloads/{name}/status"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get the current status of a specific workload

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"description":"Workload name","in":"path","name":"name","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Response containing workload status information","properties":{"status":{"description":"Current status of the workload","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["WorkloadStatusRunning","WorkloadStatusStopped","WorkloadStatusError","WorkloadStatusStarting","WorkloadStatusStopping","WorkloadStatusUnhealthy","WorkloadStatusRemoving","WorkloadStatusUnknown","WorkloadStatusUnauthenticated"]}},"type":"object","title":"v1.workloadStatusResponse"}}},"description":"OK"},"404":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}},"description":"Not Found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
